questions.question: Think twice before you take a sip …………………. that cola bottle this summer.
Scientists ..................... that excessive cola consumption can lead to everything from muscle weakness to profound muscle paralysis.
This is …………………cola drinks can cause blood potassium levels to drop to dangerously low levels.

A report published in the International Journal of Clinical Practice tells the curious case of an Australian ostrich farmer who ………………… emergency care for lung paralysis after drinking 4-10 liters of cola a day.
He made a full recovery and ……………….. to reduce his cola intake.
